questions.background: Table 1.1 shows some features of aerobic and anaerobic respiration.

parts.question: Tick the boxes that show all the correct features for each type of respiration.
State one industrial use of anaerobic respiration in yeast.
Describe one disadvantage of anaerobic respiration in terms of energy release.
parts.answer: less energy is released **per glucose molecule** than aerobic respiration ;
